SELECT PO.ID_NUMERO AS IDNUMERO, PO.DIRECCION AS DIRECCION, TO_CHAR(PO.FECHA_CREACION,'DD/MM/YYYY HH:mm:ss') AS FECHA, PO.BIEN AS BIEN, PO.UNIDAD AS UNIDAD, PO.MARCA AS MARCA, PO.PRECIO AS PRECIO, PO.SERIE AS SERIE, PO.DETALLE AS DETALLE, DECODE(PO.SBN,NULL,'SIN SBN',PO.SBN) AS SBN, PO.CODIGO AS CODIGO, DE.NOMBRE AS DESTINO, D.CANTIDAD AS CANTIDAD, D.ID_DISTRIBUCION AS IDDISTRIB
FROM PRODUCTOS_OGPL PO, DISTRIBUCION D, DEPENDENCIA DE WHERE PO.ID_NUMERO = D.ID_NUMERO AND D.CODIGO = DE.CODIGO AND DE.CODIGO = '100392' AND D.CANTIDAD > 0 ORDER BY PO.FECHA_CREACION DESC

SELECT ID_DISTRIBUCION AS IDDISTRIB, CANTIDAD AS CANTIDAD, TO_CHAR(FECHA,'DD/MM/YYYY HH:mm:ss') as FECHA, ID_NUMERO AS IDNUMERO, CODIGO AS CODIGO, ID_USUARIO AS IDUSUARIO FROM DISTRIBUCION WHERE ID_NUMERO = #{idnumero} AND CODIGO = #{iddependencia}
